dct_description_sm: compiled from official and authentic private surveys by H.F. Terry, C.E.
Shows drainage, township, section, and quarter lines, mines, etc.
"Entered according to act of Congress in the year 1877 by H.F. Terry in the office of the Librarian of Congress at Washington D.C."
Negative photocopy of map in the Library of Congress.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
